config.skipBoatCutscene.name: Skip boat cutscene
config.skipBoatCutscene.tooltip: Skip the usually unskippable top-down cutscene of a boat sailing to Ginger Island.
config.boatTicketPrice.name: Boat ticket price
config.allowIslandFarmBeforeCC.name: Allow island farm before CC
config.allowIslandFarmBeforeCC.tooltip:
Allows unlocking the west part of Ginger Island, including the island farm.
If disabled, other unlocks will be modified to allow progress before the farm is unlocked.
config.plantingOnIslandFarmBeforeCC.name: Planting on island farm before CC
config.plantingOnIslandFarmBeforeCC.tool:
Configure whether you should be able to plant crops on the island farm.
This is required to obtain some of the Golden Walnuts before CC completion.
config.boatFix.section.name: Boat fix requirements
config.boatFix.hardwoodRequired.name: Hardwood
config.boatFix.iridiumBarsRequired.name: Iridium Bars
config.boatFix.batteryPacksRequired.name: Battery Packs
config.unlockCosts.section.name: Parrot unlock costs
config.unlockCosts.ignoreFreeUnlockRequi: When enabled, any unlocks with a cost of 0 Golden Walnuts will be available right away, without first unlocking their requirements.
config.unlockCosts.firstUnlock.name: First unlock
config.unlockCosts.westUnlock.name: West / farm
config.unlockCosts.farmhouseUnlock.name: Farmhouse
config.unlockCosts.mailboxUnlock.name: Mailbox
config.unlockCosts.obeliskUnlock.name: Return Obelisk
config.unlockCosts.digsiteUnlock.name: Digsite bridge
config.unlockCosts.traderUnlock.name: Island Trader
config.unlockCosts.resortUnlock.name: Resort
config.unlockConditions.section.name: Unlock conditions #{{Number}}
config.unlockConditions.section.tooltip:
A set of conditions to unlock Ginger Island before Community Center completion.
If none are fully satisfied, Ginger Island will still unlock after completing the Community Center.
The minimum amount of hearts any player needs with Willy for this unlock.
config.unlockConditions.date.name: Earliest date
config.unlockConditions.date.tooltip:
The earliest date for this condition.
"year 2": Starting from Spring 1, Year 2.
"winter year 1": Starting from Winter 1, Year 1.
"summer 15 year 2": Starting from Summer 15, Year 2.
